Learn More

Plan Your Visit

Whether you are someone just curious about cars, an automobile enthusiast, or a serious car collector, we invite you to the San Diego Automotive Museum. We welcome our local residents as well as tourists visiting beautiful Balboa Park.

VISIT US
Hours and directions to the San Diego Automotive Museum.

ABOUT US
The story of the San Diego Automotive Museum.
OUR MISSION

Our Museum

2080 Pan American Plaza
San Diego, CA 92101

In beautiful Balboa Park

Please check our calendar for special operating hours.

Every Car Tells A Story ...
The Mission of the San Diego Automotive Museum is to tell the story of the social and technological past, present, and future of motorized vehicles throughout its collections, exhibitions, and educational programs.
Our Museum
